title: The new French manicure that will anti-age your nails for autumn
text:
Sometimes it’s the tiniest tweaks that make the biggest difference so if you aren’t one to dollop a bright new lipstick over your lips or cut your hair into radically short bob, you night be pleased to discover this tiny new season nail update.

At Gucci’s latest catwalk show in Milan, nail artist Jenny Longworth created unapologetically long, square nails, which is a refreshing departure from the rounded, pointed styles nail artists have been peddling for at least half a decade now.

A day later, she posted another picture on Instagram of singer Rihanna’s talons which she artistically fashioned into a 90’s square shape. Then, nail guru, Marian Newman, took to Instagram to share a gold tipped square-shaped...
description: Sometimes it’s the tiniest tweaks that make the biggest difference so if you aren’t one to dollop a bright new lipstick over your lips or cut your hair into radically short bob, you night be pleased to discover this tiny new season nail update.
